page.title: 16BARKSTON ASH PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: This is a small Roman Catholic school, run with the help of the local priest, Father Moxon. The school has 2.5 staff,34 children, 14 boys and 20 girls, aged to 11 years, with 3 classrooms. Notall the children live in Barkston Ash. The school does provide a school meal service.From the children surveyed 10 stayed to dinner, 4 went home,20 brought sandwiches.The school hours are 9am to 3pm, and as the village and school are both small they have a lot of contact with each other. The children wear a uniform of blue. The school does not own any pets, and there is no vandalisim.
